name: NT Directory Services Status
description: Returns `OK` if NTDS service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: DNS Server Status
description: Returns `OK` if DNS service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: Key Distribution Center Status
description: Returns `OK` if KDC service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: Net Logon Service Status
description: Returns `OK` if Netlogon service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: Windows Time Service Status
description: Returns `OK` if W32Time service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: DFS Replication Service Status
description: Returns `OK` if DFSR service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.

name: AD Web Services Status
description: Returns `OK` if ADWS service is running, `CRITICAL` if stopped, `UNKNOWN` if status cannot be determined.
